name: fullstackopen-back
description: Repository of full stack open execise of backend

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../../fullstackopen-back/
scripts.build:ui:windows: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../frontend && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
